metadata.dc:author: Pereira, A
Alcorta, I
Serra, A
Ordinas, A
metadata.dc:description: The first D(IVa) variant described so far in Spain is presented. This variant was identified, by means of a commercial monoclonal antibodies panel, in a RhD positive patient with anti-D in her serum. Differential diagnosis is discussed and the clinical relevance of identifying these variants is commented.
metadata.dc:title: Identificaci√≥n de una variante D(IVa) con anti-D en suero.
[Identification of a variant D(IVa) with anti-D in serum].
